resources.string:
● The Splash Screen of the application shows the Version Number and Release as well as the logo of the application 
 
 ● The Main Hub shows the Model and Brand of the phone 
 
 ● There is an option to view all available sensors on the phone and their details with the view all sensors button
 
 ● The Bar below the button to view all sensors calculates the remaining available storage on the phone and displays it to the user 
 
 ● The Top Left Icon takes the user to a view of the Internal battery sensors showing details like battery health, percentage, voltage etc... 

 ● The bottom left icon takes the user to all environmental sensors displaying information around the phone like pressure and light 

 ● The top right icon directs the user to motion sensors which track the built in accelerometer and gyroscope as the phone changes physical position 

 ● The user is given the option to change the sampling rate from the built in rates in the android device for the motion sensors and environmental 
 
 ● Sampling rate values are: 
 Fastest - quickest possible 
 Game - a rate suitable for games 
 UI - suitable for user interface 
 Normal - suitable for orientation changes
